short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 通过给游戏的app脚本设置async属性使第三方用户脚本更稳定的加载
short.en: Make third-party userscripts load more stable by setting the async attribute on the game's app script

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 使用该扩展可以解决闪耀色彩汉化脚本偶尔不生效的问题。
long.en: Use this extension to solve the problem that the ShinyColors localization script occasionally does not work.
